entry.title: Current Conditions: -11.7°C
entry.summary:

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing rain late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening with risk of freezing rain. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning then periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 26 December 2022
